DOC.brief_summary: The study is aimed at Type 2 Diabetics who are taking Metformin, but whose Diabetes remains poorly controlled. There are two additional medications already in use, Glimepiride and Sitagliptin will be compared to assess levels of improvement in Diabetes control.
DOC.brief_title: How Improvement in Control of Diabetes Influences the Production of a Hormone Produced in the Gut Which Improves the Release and Action of Insulin.
DOC.criteria: Diabetes Mellitus Currently on Metformin but poor glycaemic control, Under 18 years of age
